views.markdown:
Version 1.6.3 - Updated for iOS 13 Compatibility (Thanks @_024ka for testing). - Code Cleaning up. Version 1.6.2
- Added support for iOS 12 and arm64e/A12.
Version 1.6.1
- Added the iPad Support (tested and working fine too as Reported).
Version 0.0.1-5
- Added iOS 10 full Compatibility.
- Improvements in the Preferences Panel.
Version 0.0.1-4
- Completely redesigned and redefined the Settings Panel of the Tweak.

Version 0.0.1-3
- Added the option to Show the Model of the Device as the Name of the Carrier.
Version 0.0.1-2
- Added the option to Show the Searching Advice as the Name of the Carrier.
- Added the option to Enable the LTE Name of the Icon on the StatusBar.
- Optimized the description in the Settings Panel.
